nodes.text: The Titania Line was a fleet of ships serving the forces of Moff Kentor Sarne during the DarkStryder Campaign. The fleet served in the Battle of Kathol System, where its flagship Titania suffered massive damage at the hands of New Republic naval officer Kursk Mal'ia.
In addition to the Titania, the Titania Line included the following ships.
The fleet also had a complement of TIE/LN starfighters that came along with the Titania.
